column5: Mrs Splashhopper asked me if I wanted anything from the mall today.. Not even sure if I heard the rest of the conversation  after she said "mall"   .  All I "heard" was...honey... I am going to the mall.. you may as well go fishing  So I drove 15 minutes, fished 15 minutes, drove back home  It was "almost" the best 15 minutes of my life !  I arrived to find this >   and this >>   Hmmm.... That's a LOT of mud from last nights rain... So I walk about 200 yards and find this (note the sunshine and the pond scum)>>     PERFECT !  I set up my rod and throw the "scum frog" in to THE SCUM   and wait "5 steamboats" and then give it a little twitch..  WHAMMO..  and a miss  give a few more "steamboats" and another little twitch to see if its still there...  WHAMMO.. .AND ANOTHER MISS  geeeshhh... now i am getting a little worried..  A couple of "steam boats" later and WHAM... the rod damned near came out of my hand  I SET THE HOOK hard !  and bring my PB Large-mouth Bass in >>>   and here is its bucket >>    The picture doesn't do it justice at all... it was 18" and thick thick thick. Nobody on the trail at that moment to take a pic for me... I hurried up and got it back in the water to live another day.  So, I decide to try the "Scum Frog" on the SCUM again... see if it's lives up to its name again  Sure enough..... first cast and KAPOW !  fISH ON and I bring this little one in (average for this place)  ( this time a hiker was passing by and snapped a quick pic for me)  The sad thing about that last one was that the lure was so far down its throat I couldn't get the hook out. I bled it out and brought it home for my neighbor just to get the "SCUM FROG" back.  Just as I get ready for my third cast.... CRACK.. BANG... BOOM... CRASH  and holy crap.... a cloud burst right above me...   I was soaked in a matter of seconds....  That was the end of a "perfect guilt free Sunday of fishing" for me.... LMAO..  Can i say it any louder folks..... I am HOOKED on Top-WATER fishing in the sloppiest crap I can find  !!  Splashhopper
